channel.title: CNN.com - RSS Channel
channel.description: CNN.com delivers up-to-the-minute news and information on the latest top stories, weather, entertainment, politics and more.
channel.copyright: Copyright (c) 2024 Turner Broadcasting System, Inc. All Rights Reserved.

item.title: Tensions rise at college protests as Johnson calls for Columbia president to resign
item.description: Pro-Palestinian protests are taking place at major US universities, prompting some officials to take extraordinary steps to confront the growing crisis. Follow for live news updates.

item.title: April 24, 2024 - US university protests
item.description: Pro-Palestinian protests are taking place at major American universities, prompting some officials to take extraordinary steps to confront the growing crisis. Follow for live news updates.

item.title: April 24, 2024 - Israel-Hamas war
item.description: Hamas released a video of Israeli-American hostage Hersh Goldberg-Polin, the first proof that he survived being badly wounded during his capture on October 7. He is shown in the undated video with part of his left arm missing.

item.title: Supreme Court hears case about emergency abortion care
item.description: The Supreme Court heard oral arguments in another major abortion access case as it grapples with the aftermath of reversing Roe v. Wade. Follow here for live audio of the arguments, news updates, analysis and more.

item.title: David Beckham Fast Facts
item.description: Read CNN's Fast Facts about David Beckham, and learn more about the life of the retired soccer legend.

item.title: Billy Joel Fast Facts
item.description: View CNN's Fast Facts on Billy Joel and learn more about the muscian called the "Piano Man."

item.title: Penn State Scandal Fast Facts
item.description: Read CNN's Fast Facts about the Penn State scandal.

item.title: Bono Fast Facts
item.description: View CNN's Fast Facts on Bono and learn about the Grammy award-winning singer, songwriter and activist.

item.title: Elena Kagan Fast Facts
item.description: Here's a look at the life of Associate Supreme Court Justice Elena Kagan. She is the fourth woman to serve on the Supreme Court.

item.title: Judges Targeted Fast Facts
item.description: View CNN's Fast Facts to learn about notable incidents in which US judges have been targets of violence.

item.title: NATO Fast Facts
item.description: Read CNN's NATO Fast Facts for a look at the North Atlantic Treaty Organization, headquartered in Brussels, Belgium.

item.title: Notable US Spies Fast Facts
item.description: View the Notable US Spies Fast Facts from CNN and learn more about US citizens who have been convicted of spying against the United States.

item.title: Genocide Fast Facts
item.description: Read CNN's Fast Facts on genocide, the attempted or intentional destruction of a national, racial, religious, or ethnic group, whether in wartime or peace.

item.title: Willie Mays Fast Facts
item.description: Read Fast Facts from CNN about Hall of Famer Willie Mays.

item.title: Summer Olympics Competitions Fast Facts
item.description: Read CNN's Summer Olympics Fast Facts to learn more about the athletic competition.

item.title: Heisman Trophy Fast Facts
item.description: Read CNN's Fast Facts about college football's Heisman Trophy, an annual award presented to the "most outstanding football player in the United States."

item.title: Iran's Nuclear Capabilities Fast Facts
item.description: Read CNN's Fast Facts on Iran's nuclear capabilities.

item.title: April 23, 2024 - Israel-Hamas war
item.description: After 200 days of war, Israeli attacks in Gaza have killed more than 34,000 Palestinians, according to the enclave's health ministry. CNN cannot independently confirm the numbers due to the lack of international media access.

item.title: Protests at Columbia and other schools escalate
item.description: Officials at Columbia University, facing surging tensions on campus, have taken steps to try to address students' concerns over safety and freedom of expression.

item.title: Second day of testimony wraps in Trump hush money trial
item.description: Donald Trump's New York hush money criminal trial continued Tuesday with more testimony from former tabloid executive David Pecker. The judge also held a gag order hearing.

item.title: April 22, 2024 - Israel-Hamas war
item.description: The head of the Israeli military's intelligence branch has resigned, becoming the first senior military figure to resign over October 7 failings.

item.title: April 22, 2024 - Protests at Columbia and other schools escalate
item.description: Heightened tensions around pro-Palestinian protests on the campus of Columbia University have led the school to go all-virtual on Monday. The protests are now in their sixth day.

item.title: Trump criminal trial wraps for the day after opening statements and first witness
item.description: Donald Trump's New York hush money criminal trial continued Monday, with opening statements and the first witness taking the stand. Read real-time updates, analysis and highlights from court.

item.title: Today's news in 10 minutes
item.description: April 26, 2024

item.title: Today's news in 10 minutes
item.description: April 19

item.title: April 21, 2024 - News on the Middle East conflicts
item.description: Israeli settlers attacked Palestinians in the West Bank this weekend, according to the Palestinian health ministry, while the IDF carried out one of its largest operations in the occupied territory since October 7.

item.title: April 20, 2024 - News on the Middle East conflicts
item.description: The Israeli military is carrying out what appears to be one of its largest operations in the West Bank since October 7, while broader tensions simmer in the Middle East following strikes between Iran and Israel. Follow for live updates.

item.title: House passes key foreign aid package
item.description: The House has passed a key foreign aid package on Saturday. Follow here for the latest live news updates from Capitol Hill.

item.title: April 19, 2024 - Iran targeted in aerial attack
item.description: Israel carried out a military strike on Iran early Friday, a US official told CNN, in a potentially dangerous escalation of a fast-widening Middle East conflict that Iranian officials have so far sought to play down.

item.title: Day 4 of Trump New York hush money trial
item.description: Jury selection for the remaining alternates continues Friday in former President Donald Trump's hush money criminal trial. Follow here for the latest live news updates, analysis and more.
